reviewText: I wish I had read the description more carefully, the subtitles are in Italian. Since it is a silent film the audio is just music so I have no clue what is going on in he story. I didn't mind the poor quality since it is rare but it would ave been nice to understand what was going on.

Until a legit copy comes out,skipp this dvd r burned copy.returned mine after receiving it.pretty bad. U can catch this on tcm and record it which the 1999 restored but this the 104 min cut verison,with terriable noise on the soundtrack.
